fields.title: Tab fields
fields.description: Defines the fields that will appear within these tabs, based on the 'tab' property of the field.

stretch.title: Stretch tab
stretch.description: If true, this tab's content will stretch to the full vertical height of the parent element.

defaultTab.title: Default tab name
defaultTab.description: Defines the name of the default tab that fields are assigned to.

icons.title: Tab icons
icons.description: Assigns icons to the tabs, using tab names as the key.

lazy.title: Lazy load tab?
lazy.description: If true, this tab will be lazy loaded, only loading the fields within when clicked on. This increases performance on forms with a large number of fields within the tab.

cssClass.title: Tab CSS class
cssClass.description: Defines a custom CSS class to assign to the tab container

paneCssClass.title: Tab pane CSS class
paneCssClass.description: Defines a custom CSS class to assign to the tab pane (content)
